title: Ticket #6011: Control bind mounts for Singularity
description:
One oversight in testing the initial Singularity support -

HTCondor automatically enables "container mode" for singularity, which applies additional isolation protections.

In this mode, the admin-specified automatic bind mounts (such as /cvmfs) are ignored. Hence, we should add a configuration knob that allows HTCondor to add arbitrary bind mounts.

Marking as relatively important as various OSG VOs heavily utilize CVMFS and wouldn't be able to switch from glexec to singularity without it.
remarks:
2016-Dec-09 14:12:07 by wenger:
SINGULARITY_BIND_EXPR was documented in a commit for #5828, so I'm going to resolve this ticket.
